TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GroupShapeLocks extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlCompositeElement

Docs.summary: Defines the GroupShapeLocks Class. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is a:grpSpLocks.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **grpSpLocks (Group Shape Locks)** This element specifies all locking properties for a connection shape. These properties inform the generating application about specific properties that have been previously locked and thus should not be changed. |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |cNvGrpSpPr (§21.3.2.5); cNvGrpSpPr (§20.1.2.2.6); cNvGrpSpPr (§20.5.2.6); cNvGrpSpPr (§19.3.1.10)| |Child Elements|Subclause| |--------------------|---------------| |extLst (Extension List)|§20.1.2.2.15| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |noChangeAspect (Disallow Aspect Ratio Change)|Specifies that the generating application should not allow aspect ratio changes for the corresponding connection shape. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of false is assumed.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *boolean* datatype.| |noGrp (Disallow Shape Grouping)|Specifies that the corresponding group shape cannot be grouped. That is it cannot be combined within other shapes to form a group of shapes. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of false is assumed.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *boolean* datatype.| |noMove (Disallow Moving Shape)|Specifies that the corresponding graphic frame cannot be moved. Objects that reside within the graphic frame can still be moved unless they also have been locked. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of false is assumed.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *boolean* datatype.| |noResize (Disallow Shape Resizing)|Specifies that the corresponding group shape cannot be resized. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of false is assumed.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *boolean* datatype.| |noRot (Disallow Shape Rotation)|Specifies that the corresponding group shape cannot be rotated Objects that reside within the group can still be rotated unless they also have been locked. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of false is assumed.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *boolean* datatype.| |noSelect (Disallow Shape Selection)|Specifies that the corresponding group shape cannot have any part of it be selected. That means that no picture, shapes or attached text can be selected either if this attribute has been specified. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of false is assumed.

[*Note*: This property is inherited by sub-elements and thus all shapes within the group shape cannot be selected when this attribute is set to a value of true. *end note*]

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *boolean* datatype.| |noUngrp (Disallow Shape Ungrouping)|Specifies that the generating application should not show adjust handles for the corresponding connection shape. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of false is assumed.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *boolean* datatype.| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_GroupLocking) is located in §A.4.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NoChangeAspect : DocumentFormat.OpenXml.BooleanValue with get, set

Docs.summary: Disallow Aspect Ratio Change.Represents the following attribute in the schema: noChangeAspect

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies that the generating application should not allow aspect ratio changes for the corresponding connection shape. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of `false` is assumed.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the XML Schema `boolean` datatype.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NoGrouping : DocumentFormat.OpenXml.BooleanValue with get, set

Docs.summary: Disallow Shape Grouping.Represents the following attribute in the schema: noGrp

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies that the corresponding group shape cannot be grouped. That is it cannot be combined within other shapes to form a group of shapes. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of `false` is assumed.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the XML Schema `boolean` datatype.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NoMove : DocumentFormat.OpenXml.BooleanValue with get, set

Docs.summary: Disallow Moving Shape.Represents the following attribute in the schema: noMove

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies that the corresponding graphic frame cannot be moved. Objects that reside within the graphic frame can still be moved unless they also have been locked. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of `false` is assumed.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the XML Schema `boolean` datatype.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NoResize : DocumentFormat.OpenXml.BooleanValue with get, set

Docs.summary: Disallow Shape Resizing.Represents the following attribute in the schema: noResize

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies that the corresponding group shape cannot be resized. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of `false` is assumed.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the XML Schema `boolean` datatype.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NoRotation : DocumentFormat.OpenXml.BooleanValue with get, set

Docs.summary: Disallow Shape Rotation.Represents the following attribute in the schema: noRot

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies that the corresponding group shape cannot be rotated Objects that reside within the group can still be rotated unless they also have been locked. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of `false` is assumed.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the XML Schema `boolean` datatype.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NoSelection : DocumentFormat.OpenXml.BooleanValue with get, set

Docs.summary: Disallow Shape Selection.Represents the following attribute in the schema: noSelect

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies that the corresponding group shape cannot have any part of it be selected. That means that no picture, shapes or attached text can be selected either if this attribute has been specified. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of `false` is assumed.
This property is inherited by sub-elements and thus all shapes within the group shape cannot be selected when this attribute is set to a value of `true`.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the XML Schema `boolean` datatype.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NoUngrouping : DocumentFormat.OpenXml.BooleanValue with get, set

Docs.summary: Disallow Shape Ungrouping.Represents the following attribute in the schema: noUngrp

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies that the generating application should not show adjust handles for the corresponding connection shape. If this attribute is not specified, then a value of `false` is assumed.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the XML Schema `boolean` datatype.
